title: Understanding the Effects of Cannabinoids
text: Cannabinoids can have various effects on the developing fetus. Consider both immediate and long-term impacts.

title: Immediate Effects
text: Think about how cannabinoids might affect the growth and development of the fetus during pregnancy.

title: Long-term Effects
text: Consider how exposure to cannabinoids might influence the child's future behavior and mental health.

hintAnswer: Attention deficits, future substance abuse, future depression, poor growth, $$long-term$$ problems with executive function
title: Identifying the Correct Effects
text: Which of the following are known effects of maternal cannabinoid use on the child?
choices: attention deficits, future substance abuse, future depression, poor growth, $$long-term$$ problems with executive function
attention deficits, future substance abuse, future depression, poor growth, $$long-term$$ problems with executive function, future infertility
future substance abuse, future depression, poor growth, $$long-term$$ problems with executive function
